title: Infographic: IAF down to four C-130J Super Hercules aircraft - Times of India
text: IAF down to four C-130J Super Hercules aircraft IAF down to four C-130J Super Hercules aircraft The Indian Airforce is down to four C-130J Super Hercules aircraft after a freak accident left one badly damaged while it was taxing at a high altitude Ladakh airfield. The IAF had earlier lost a C-130J during "a training sortie" near Gwalior in 2014, killing the five personnel on board. Here’s a look at why this aircraft is critical for the IAF and what it took to acquire them. TNN | The Indian Airforce is down to four C-130J Super Hercules aircraft after a freak accident left one badly damaged while it was taxing at a high altitude Ladakh airfield. The IAF had earlier lost a C-130J during "a training sortie" near Gwalior in 2014, killing the five personnel on board. Here’s a look at why this aircraft is critical for the IAF and what it took to acquire them. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
